alert.note: Alert for Edwards; Real; Val Verde (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 7:34PM CDT until May 12 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Edwards County in south central Texas... Northeastern Val Verde County in south central Texas... Northwestern Real County in south central Texas... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 734 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 20 miles northeast of Juno to 19 miles northeast of Loma Alta to 16 miles north of Alamo Village, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Rocksprings, Loma Alta, Carta Valley, Us-377 Near The Kimble- Edwards County Line, Devil`s Sinkhole State Natural Area, Vinegarone and Us-277 Near The Sutton-Edwards County Line. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
